description: This is an HTML source file for a database viewer interface, featuring a layout to display connected databases and their tables with the ability to load and display the data in a structured format.

classes.name: Database Viewer
classes.description: User interface for viewing and managing database connections and tables.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of available databases from the server.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads available databases and displays them on the sidebar.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a specific database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table in a database.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data in a table format for display.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands the content of a table cell to display full data when clicked.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Displays a loading message in a given element.

methods.name: showError
methods.description: Shows an error message within a given element.

methods.name: showEmptyState
methods.description: Displays a message indicating no data is available.

methods.name: setActiveState
methods.description: Sets an active class on a specific element, removing it from others.
